short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple find and replace extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace Anything is an efficient browser extension designed to swiftly find and replace text on web pages. Whether you're looking to change words, phrases, or entire text blocks, this extension makes it effortless.
